metadata.title: .ts | TypeScript 入门笔记
metadata.excerpt: An introduction to Typescript and some simple syntax

children.value: types from 3rd parties can be added with type definition
dynamic: types associated with run-time values, and not explicitly in code
cons: more codes to write, requires compilation,

sudo npm i -g typescript
tsc -v
touch index.ts

npx create-react-app . --template typescript
npm start
touch header.tsx
types from 3rd parties can be added with type definition
dynamic: types associated with run-time values, and not explicitly in code
cons: more codes to write, requires compilation,
// no error, but not what we want
